interpretation: The Red Circle represents wholeness, infinity, and unity. This card symbolizes the endless cycle of life and the importance of balance and completion. It represents a protective energy that surrounds us and keeps us safe. This card reminds us that everything is interconnected and that we are all part of a larger whole. The Red Circle encourages us to embrace our own power and to trust in the universe's plan for us. It is a reminder that we are all capable of achieving our goals and dreams, and that we are never alone in our journey. This card also reminds us to take care of ourselves and to prioritize our physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being. When the Red Circle appears in a reading, it may indicate a need for grounding, balance, and protection. It may also suggest that a project or situation is coming full circle, and that completion is near. Trust in the process and have faith in yourself and the universe.
